Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near 79th/Lafayette
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 79th, Vincennes, 83rd and Lafayette due to street blockage near 79th/Lafayette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 79th, Vincennes, 83rd and Lafayette due to street blockage near 79th/Lafayette.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
